ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] heritrix 3 - new job error
ygData.msgSnippet: hi raffaele, this is a known bug which unfortunately made it into the release. a workaround is described in the release notes.

hi raffaele,

this is a known bug which unfortunately made it into
the rele=
ase. a workaround is described in the release
notes.

https://webarchive.ji=
ra.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+3.0.0#ReleaseNotes-3.0.0-5.Kno=
wnIssues

it has been fixed in the latest builds.

http://builds.archive.or=
g:8081/continuum/servlet/continuum/target/WorkingCopy.vm/view/WorkingCopy/i=
d/76?userDirectory=3Ddist/target

sorry for the inconvenience!


/steve@arc=
hive.org
